metrics_conclusion: In terms of chords and melody, Pulse has complexity on par with the typical song, having near-average scores in Chord Complexity and Melodic Complexity and below-average scores in Chord-Melody Tension, Chord Progression Novelty and Chord-Bass Melody.
key_conclusion:
Pulse is written in the key of C Major.  

According to the Theorytab database, it is the most common key in all of popular music. 

See the C Major Cheat Sheet for popular chords, chord progressions, downloadable midi files and more!
